sentences.english: Can be used for very elemental analysis, storage of organic solvents.
sentences.chinese: 可用於很量分析元素，存儲有機溶劑。

sentences.english: Premium solvent, odourless and no harmful to skin.
sentences.chinese: 優質溶劑，無氣味，不傷皮膚。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the in vitro antitumor action of the different extracts of different solvents from Ganoderma lipsiense.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討樹舌靈芝各溶劑提取物的抗癌作用。

sentences.english: Limitedly resistant to strong acid, strong alkali, strong oxidizing solution and strong solvent.
sentences.chinese: 而且更具有很高的熱穩定性，抗強鹼性及抗強溶劑性。

sentences.english: Polyurethane elastomer systems for solvent-free spray-up were prepared.
sentences.chinese: 製備了無溶劑噴塗成型聚氨酯彈性體體系。

sentences.english: The aromatic extraction laboratory scale test was mainly introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 主要介紹以純糠醛爲溶劑的芳烴抽提小試實驗。

sentences.english: Resistance to solvent, strong in wet condition and be used as cloth.
sentences.chinese: 抗溶劑，溼強度佳，有如布般的感覺，可重覆使用。

sentences.english: Cleaning an oil painting on canvas is a delicate procedure using special solvent.
sentences.chinese: 清潔的布上油畫是一個微妙的過程使用特殊溶劑。

sentences.english: Lipase N435 was screened as catalyst, and tert-butanol as solvent.
sentences.chinese: 篩選出脂肪酶N435作爲催化劑，叔丁醇作爲溶劑。

sentences.english: The crude phytosterols dissolved in solvent and reacted with metal salts to get the complex.
sentences.chinese: 將粗製甾醇溶於溶劑中與金屬鹽溶液形成絡合物。

sentences.english: In the paper, the coating and its solvent for plastic vacuoplating are probed.
sentences.chinese: 本文對塑料真空鍍膜用的塗料和溶劑進行了探索。

sentences.english: Xylene and decalin are better solvents than the others.
sentences.chinese: 二甲苯和十氫萘是較好的溶劑。

sentences.english: The pretreatment and different extraction solvents of E.
sentences.chinese: 總黃酮的含量隨提取溶劑的不同而有高有低。

sentences.english: New adhesives do not receive ITTF authorisation if they contain volatile organic solvents.
sentences.chinese: 含揮發性有機溶劑的新膠水不能得到國際乒聯的許可。

sentences.english: Contact toxicity of seed extracts from Dodonaea viscose against Sitophilus oryzae were determined.
sentences.chinese: 測定了坡柳種子不同溶劑提取物對米象的觸殺作用。

sentences.english: Raoult's law is only going to apply for the solvent.
sentences.chinese: 拉烏爾定律只對溶劑使用。
